newsitem.title: USA: Computer Assocs lures reseller from Tivoli.
newsitem.headline: Computer Assocs lures reseller from Tivoli.

text.p: Computer Associates International Inc said privately held Network Computer Solutions Inc had ended its two-year partnership with Tivoli Systems and chosen to work with Computer Associates instead.

Computer Associates said it has authorized Network Computer, a major systems integrator operating in the Carolinas region of the United States, to resell CA-Unicenter, its client/server enterprise management software.
Tivoli is a unit of International Business Machines Corp.
Computers Associates and Tivoli compete head-to-head in the business of supplying software to manage large corporate information networks.
